text:
Distance and rate problem

[imath] \mathbf{q} [/imath]\n0\n(1) Darryl left the White House and traveled\ntoward the Ferry office at an average speed of 25 mph. Some time later Jacob left traveling in the oposite direction with an avarage speed of 35 mph. After Darryl\nWad traveled for four hours they were 170\nmiles apart. How long did jacob travel?
